Description: Painted limestone shabti of Sğm-ʿš Wnnfr with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with incised eyes traced in black, a red and white collar and parallel hands in relief holding two incised hoes and the string of the incised seed-basket that hangs over one shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in eight rows of incised Hieroglyphs separated with red lines.
